value.name: Body-cam videos released in death in Pleasanton police custody
value.description: PLEASANTON, Calif. - Body-camera videos show Pleasanton police officers taking Jacob Bauer into custody in 2018 shortly before he died at a hospital. Rose Bauer is heartbroken over her son's death.
